title: Vanquish
description: Home isn’t always a place, but a person. Or maybe people.Exiled from the Underworld, I run home to lick my wounds and analyze everything I did wrong. It keeps coming back to one simple answer.Persephone must die for her crimes, and next time I get the chance, I won’t hesitate.I just need that second chance. To gain it, I have to figure out how to return to the Underworld by passing some unknown test only the sentient world knows.Easy, right?Not when my mates suspect what I must do. Now, I’m not so sure I want to head back to the Underworld anymore.Some costs are just too high. It’s a shame my fate won’t let me off the hook this time. I just need to Vanquish my love.***Welcome to the Fated Universe, where each series focuses on a different set of fated mates. By the end of each series, each couple will have their happily ever after. Reverse Harem Paranormal Romance.Not every loose end will be resolved in each universe at the end of each series. Some secrets will span across additional series but will in no way take away from the individual stories. You can still read each series out of order, but the suggested reading order is as follows:Fated Souls - SabinaSurrenderSubmissionSeductionSalvationSabinaFated Sight - VanessaVisionsViciousVanquishVengeanceA Fated World Standalone - KendallCerberusChaos Magic - PepperPsychotic - Halloween 2022PretentiousPompousPerversePerilous
author: Elle Lincoln
